page.title: 13MODERN KITCHEN
page.content: A modern kitchen is fitted with a wide range of washing machines,cookers and cupboards.It is all included in the price of a house.The cooker is a hob and has a cooker hood to take away appetising aromas and the cloying smells in the kitchen.The fridges have ample space.There is a compartment for frozen food.All these appliances are built in the latest housing design.The washing machine is fully automatic with all a family's washing programmes at the touch of a button. Normally a person would pay over Â£1000 to install all of the kitchen utensils like microwaves and cooker hoods etc. You would say that they are real luxury kitchens!
